reviewText: Li Yi Min, and Lung Fei star as rivals again.  Li Yi Min a wanted man after getting revenge for his fathers death, killing Lung Fei's top man.  After a long search and many death's the two finally meet.  Soon after a strange man enters the town looking for Lung Fei as well, at first he joins forces with him, but may have other reasons for being there.  In a final death fight Li Yi Min and Lung Fei battle it out, and with teh help of the mystery man one will prevail.  Non stop action long fights, and some strong boxing styles.  One of Li Yi Mins first films I believe.
